Author: mknzngcnb
Text: it’s one of those flat circular batteries :( nothing else has the same and i had to personally buy that replacement battery. I suppose i’m going to have to go off of my most recent weight instead

Author: blueberry0666
Text: Weighing yourself is the devil and you hit your goal so yay! But if you really must, maybe look around the house and see if there’s something else that has those same batteries you could borrow from? Tv remotes, Bluetooth speakers, clocks...?  :)
